0.text: Innate: Zed's basic attacks against targets below 50% maximum health are empowered to deal 6 / 8 / 10% (based on level) of the target's maximum health as bonus magic damage.

1.text: Against  monsters, Contempt for the Weak deals 200% damage, capped at 300.
1.html: Against monsters, Contempt for the Weak deals 200% damage, capped at 300.
markedPassages: monsters

2.text: Contempt for the Weak cannot occur on the same  champion more than once every few seconds.
2.html: Contempt for the Weak cannot occur on the same champion more than once every few seconds.
markedPassages: champion

0.text: Active: Zed throws a shuriken in the target direction that deals physical damage to enemies hit, reduced to 60% against targets beyond the first.
0.html: Active: Zed throws a shuriken in the target direction that deals physical damage to enemies hit, reduced to 60% against targets beyond the first.

0.text: Passive: Zed restores  energy whenever he and his  Shadows or multiple Shadows hit an ability on the same target. This may only occur once per cast ability.
0.html: Passive: Zed restores  energy whenever he and his Shadows or multiple Shadows hit an ability on the same target. This may only occur once per cast ability.
markedPassages: energy

1.text: Active: Zed creates a  Shadow that dashes to the target location and remains there for 5.25 seconds, being able to mimic  Razor Shuriken and  Shadow Slash regardless of range. Living Shadow can be recast while within range of the Shadow.
1.html: Active: Zed creates a Shadow that dashes to the target location and remains there for 5.25 seconds, being able to mimic Razor Shuriken and Shadow Slash regardless of range. Living Shadow can be recast while within range of the Shadow.
markedPassages: Razor Shuriken
Shadow Slash

2.text: Recast: Zed and the  Shadow  blink to swap places. If Living Shadow was recast while the Shadow is dashing, the recast will instead occur once it has been placed.
2.html: Recast: Zed and the Shadow blink to swap places. If Living Shadow was recast while the Shadow is dashing, the recast will instead occur once it has been placed.
markedPassages: blink

3.text: If an ability is cast while the Shadow is dashing, it will cast that ability once it has been placed. See Pets for more details about Shadows. Living Shadow will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
3.html: If an ability is cast while the Shadow is dashing, it will cast that ability once it has been placed. See Pets for more details about Shadows. Living Shadow will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

0.text: Active: Zed slashes to deal physical damage to nearby enemies.
0.html: Active: Zed slashes to deal physical damage to nearby enemies.

1.text: Enemies hit by a  Shadow's slash are  slowed for 1.5 seconds, with multiple slashes dealing no additional damage but the slow's effectiveness being increased by 50%.
1.html: Enemies hit by a Shadow's slash are slowed for 1.5 seconds, with multiple slashes dealing no additional damage but the slow's effectiveness being increased by 50%.
markedPassages: slowed

2.text: Living Shadow's  current cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds for each enemy  champion hit by Zed's slash.
2.html: Living Shadow's  current cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds for each enemy champion hit by Zed's slash.
markedPassages: Living Shadow's
current cooldown
champion

0.text: Active: Zed becomes  untargetable and, after 0.6 seconds, he  dashes 125 units through the target enemy champion over 0.35 seconds. Afterwards, he becomes targetable again, renders them Marked for Death for 3 seconds, and gains  ghosting for the same duration.
0.html: Active: Zed becomes untargetable and, after 0.6 seconds, he dashes 125 units through the target enemy champion over 0.35 seconds. Afterwards, he becomes targetable again, renders them Marked for Death for 3 seconds, and gains ghosting for the same duration.
markedPassages: untargetable
dashes
ghosting

1.text: Zed also spawns a  Shadow at his casting position for 9 seconds which is able to mimic  Razor Shuriken and  Shadow Slash regardless of range. Death Mark can be recast after 0.5 seconds of his reappearance while the  Shadow is active, though not in the last 1.25 seconds of its duration.

Shadow Slash

2.text: Marked for Death: Zed stores a portion of all pre-mitigation physical damage and magic damage he and his  Shadows deal to the target, detonating at the end of the duration to deal physical damage.
2.html: Marked for Death: Zed stores a portion of all pre-mitigation physical damage and magic damage he and his Shadows deal to the target, detonating at the end of the duration to deal physical damage.

3.html: Recast: Zed and the Shadow blink to swap places.
markedPassages: blink

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Ever Rising Moon: Hitting an enemy champion with 2 separate attacks or abilities within 1.5 seconds deals bonus physical damage equal to ( 6% / 3%) of target's maximum health and grants you 15% bonus movement speed and a shield for ( 160 / 80) (+ ( 35% / 17.5%) bonus AD) for 2 seconds (( 6 / 12) second cooldown).
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 4% armor penetration and 5 bonus movement speed.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – EVER RISING MOON: Hitting an enemy champion with 2 separate attacks or abilities within 1.5 seconds deals bonus physical damage equal to ( 6% /  3%) of target's maximum health and grants you 15% bonus movement speed and a  shield for ( 160 /  80) (+ ( 35% /  17.5%) bonus AD) for 2 seconds (( 6 /  12) second cooldown).

1.originHTML: +  +  900

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Cleave: Damaging basic attacks and ability damage from abilities deal ( 40% AD / 20% AD) physical damage to other enemies within 350 units of the target damaged. Can only hit each target once per attack or ability, and may only trigger once every 10 seconds from the same cast.
Unique – Carnivorous: Gain 0.5 bonus attack damage whenever you kill a minion, doubled for kills against champions, large monsters, and large minions. This effect stacks up to 40 times, for a total of 20 bonus attack damage. Lose 60% of stacks upon death.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – CLEAVE: Damaging basic attacks and ability damage from abilities deal ( 40% AD /  20% AD) physical damage to other enemies within 350 units of the target damaged. Can only hit each target once per attack or ability, and may only trigger once every 10 seconds from the same cast.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Carve: Dealing physical damage to an enemy champion applies a stack of Carve for 6 seconds, stacking up to 6 times. Each stack inflicts 5% armor reduction, up to 30% at 6 stacks.
Unique – Rage: Dealing physical damage to an enemy champion grants 3 bonus movement speed per stack of Carve on them for 2 seconds, up to 18.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Cleave: Damaging basic attacks and ability damage from abilities deal ( 40% AD / 20% AD) physical damage to other enemies within 350 units of the target damaged. Can only hit each target once per attack or ability, and may only trigger once every 10 seconds from the same cast.
Unique – Carnivorous: Gain 0.5 bonus attack damage whenever you kill a minion, doubled for kills against champions, large monsters, and large minions. This effect stacks up to 40 times, for a total of 20 bonus attack damage. Lose 60% of stacks upon death.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – CLEAVE: Damaging basic attacks and ability damage from abilities deal ( 40% AD /  20% AD) physical damage to other enemies within 350 units of the target damaged. passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Carve: Dealing physical damage to an enemy champion applies a stack of Carve for 6 seconds, stacking up to 6 times. Each stack inflicts 5% armor reduction, up to 30% at 6 stacks.
Unique – Rage: Dealing physical damage to an enemy champion grants 3 bonus movement speed per stack of Carve on them for 2 seconds, up to 18.

Passive

Unique – Rebirth: Upon taking lethal damage, enter resurrection for 4 seconds, during which you are invulnerable, untargetable, and unable to act, and afterwards heal for 50% of base health and restore 30% of maximum mana (300 (starts after resurrecting) second cooldown).
